alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Hempstead; Lafayette; Miller; Nevada (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 5:12PM CDT until June 14 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Hempstead County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... North central Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Nevada County in southwestern Arkansas... North central Columbia County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 512 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fulton, or 9 miles southwest of Hope, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hope, Emmet, Perrytown, Rosston, Willisville, Bodcaw, Bluff City, White Oak Lake State Park, Cale, Patmos, Young, Sutton, Waterloo, Falcon, Mount Moriah, Hervey, Morris, Laneburg and Reader. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
